00012 __attribute__((weak)) int xeno_sigxcpu_no_mlock = 1;

00014 static void  xeno_handle_mlock_alert (int sig)
00015 
00016 {
00017     if (xeno_sigxcpu_no_mlock)
00018         {
00019         fprintf(stderr,"Xenomai: process memory not locked (missing mlockall?)\n");
00020         fflush(stderr);
00021         exit(4);
00022         }
00023     else
00024         {
00025         /* XNTRAPSW was set for the thread but no user-defined
00026            handler has been set to override our internal handler, so
00027            let's invoke the default signal action. */
00028         struct sigaction sa;
00029 
00030         sa.sa_handler = SIG_DFL;
00031         sigemptyset(&sa.sa_mask);
00032         sa.sa_flags = 0;
00033         sigaction(SIGXCPU,&sa,NULL);
00034         pthread_kill(pthread_self(),SIGXCPU);
00035         }
00036 }

00039 xeno_user_skin_init(unsigned skin_magic, const char *skin, const char *module)
00040 {
00041     struct sigaction sa;
00042     xnfeatinfo_t finfo;
00043     int muxid;
00044 
00045 #ifdef xeno_arch_features_check
00046     xeno_arch_features_check();
00047 #endif /* xeno_arch_features_check */
00048     
00049     muxid = XENOMAI_SYSBIND(skin_magic,
00050                             XENOMAI_FEAT_DEP,
00051                             XENOMAI_ABI_REV,
00052                             &finfo);
00053     switch (muxid)
00054         {
00055         case -EINVAL:
00056 
00057             fprintf(stderr,"Xenomai: incompatible feature set\n");
00058             fprintf(stderr,"(required=\"%s\", present=\"%s\", missing=\"%s\").\n",
00059                     finfo.feat_man_s,finfo.feat_all_s,finfo.feat_mis_s);
00060             exit(1);
00061 
00062         case -ENOEXEC:
00063 
00064             fprintf(stderr,"Xenomai: incompatible ABI revision level\n");
00065             fprintf(stderr,"(needed=%lu, current=%lu).\n",
00066                     XENOMAI_ABI_REV,finfo.abirev);
00067             exit(1);
00068 
00069         case -ENOSYS:
00070         case -ESRCH:
00071 
00072             fprintf(stderr,"Xenomai: %s skin or CONFIG_XENO_OPT_PERVASIVE disabled.\n"
00073                     "(modprobe %s?)\n", skin, module);
00074             exit(1);
00075         }
00076     
00077     if (muxid < 0)
00078         {
00079         fprintf(stderr,"Xenomai: binding failed: %s.\n",strerror(-muxid));
00080         exit(1);
00081         }
00082 
00083     /* Install a SIGXCPU handler to intercept alerts about unlocked
00084        process memory. */
00085 
00086     sa.sa_handler = &xeno_handle_mlock_alert;
00087     sigemptyset(&sa.sa_mask);
00088     sa.sa_flags = 0;
00089     sigaction(SIGXCPU,&sa,NULL);
00090
